title.en: A Prayer to the Sublime Khenchen Tsultrim Lodrö

text.en: All the rivers of  sūtra and mantra Dharma
text.en-trans: do ngak chö kyi chuwo malüpa

text.en: Flow into the single ocean of your wisdom—
text.en-trans: khyenpé gyatso chik tu khyilwa yi

text.en: Mipham Gyatso, Mañjughoṣa in person,
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö mipam gyatso la

text.en: To you I pray: look on me with eyes of wisdom!
text.en-trans: solwa deb so yeshe chen gyi zik

text.en: From the orange syllabledhīḥat the lord’s enlightened heart,
text.en-trans: gön dé tukké marser dhi yik gi

text.en: Light rays of activity shine as the splendour of those to be tamed.
text.en-trans: trinlé özer duljé pal du shar

text.en: Like a wish-fulfilling jewel that makes all connections meaningful—
text.en-trans: dreltsé dönden yizhin norbu yi

text.en: May the light of blessings nurture me throughout all my lives.
text.en-trans: jinlab ö kyi tserab küntu kyong

text.en: Upon the wish-fulfilling tree of pure ethical discipline,
text.en-trans: namdak tsultrim paksam jönpa la

text.en: The branches and leaves of intelligence born of study, reflection and meditation bloom.
text.en-trans: tö sam gompé lodrö yaldab gyé

text.en: To the protector of beings in the Snowy Land,
text.en-trans: gangjong chimé lha yi kyetsal gyi

text.en: Pleasure grove of the immortal gods, I pray.
text.en-trans: tö ché drowé gön der solwa deb

text.en: With youthful qualities and enlightened resolve unmatched by others,
text.en-trans: yönten langtso zhen dang mi nyampé

text.en: The time came for you, like a white lotus,
text.en-trans: tukkyé dü bab pema karpo khyé

text.en: To take birth, through the merit of the world, in Treshö, Dokham,
text.en-trans: dokham tré shö dzinmé sönam kyi

text.en: An ornament beautifying the medicinal valley of Buddha’s teachings.
text.en-trans: tubten men jong dzepé gyen du trung

text.en: On the pleasant slopes of the mountain of great secret solitude,
text.en-trans: sang chen wenpé ri ngok nyamgawar

text.en: You served the supreme refuge, the guru Mañjuvajra,
text.en-trans: kyab chok lama jampé dorjé zhab

text.en: Delighting him in the three ways and receiving instructions,
text.en-trans: nyepa sum gyi ten né tukgong lön

text.en: So that delusion regarding knowable phenomena was entirely dispelled.
text.en-trans: shejé chö la mongpa ta né sang

text.en: That protector, in his wisdom of unobstructed knowledge,
text.en-trans: gön dé dribmé khyenpé yeshe kyi

text.en: Saw that you would become a splendour for the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: jung gyur ten drö pal du yong zik né

text.en: An incredible master of the teachings of the Ancient Translations,
text.en-trans: ngagyur tenpé dakpo samyé pa

text.en: And named you Tsultrim Lodrö Chok—"Disciplined Intellect Supreme".
text.en-trans: tsultrim lodrö chok gi tsen dé sol

text.en: From the realm that is encircled by snowy mountains,
text.en-trans: gangkar riwö korwé gyalkham né

text.en: The scent of your enlightened activity,
text.en-trans: lab sum yönten yongsu dzokpa lé

text.en: Emerging from the perfection of qualities of the three trainings,
text.en-trans: trinlé drisung golé drö dang drel

text.en: Reaches the distant shores of great oceans, East and West.
text.en-trans: shar nub gyatso chenpö ta lé gal

text.en: Your pure conduct enhances the beauty of the saffron robes,
text.en-trans: ngurmik gyen gyi dzepé künchö dak

text.en: Your pure altruistic concern is to benefit the teachings and beings,
text.en-trans: ten dang dro la penpé lhaksam tsang

text.en: You have mastered the topics of sūtra and mantra and scientific knowledge,
text.en-trans: do ngak sheja rigpé né la wang

text.en: And you are the supreme guide on the path to liberation—to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tarwé lam tön chok der solwa deb

text.en: With hands of compassion, countless times you have stayed
text.en-trans: jikrung trak gi yur chu zhur sa na

text.en: The knives of butchers would would cruelly steal the lives
text.en-trans: dukngal chima trikpé semchen gyi

text.en: Of terrified creatures moved to tears by their misery
text.en-trans: sok gi shé du darwé raldri so

text.en: In gruesome places where gutters overflow with blood.
text.en-trans: nyingjé chak gi kakpé drang mi zin

text.en: You do not sit upon lofty thrones of gold.
text.en-trans: tönpö ser tri kha na khyé nyimé

text.en: You are not found amidst the wealthy throng.
text.en-trans: jor chuk du long ü né khyé mi jal

text.en: But within enclosures where mud runs darkly red,
text.en-trans: marnak damdzab yowé rawa na

text.en: You remain as a protector, a rescuer of tormented beings.
text.en-trans: nyamtak drowa drenpé gön du tak

text.en: Your saffron robes, bestowed by the gods,
text.en-trans: lha yi nangwé ngurmik nazé gö

text.en: Are the attire of a great sage who does no harm.
text.en-trans: tsemé drangsong chenpö chaluk dé

text.en: Wherever there are beings who lack protection,
text.en-trans: kyabmé drowa gang na yöpé sar

text.en: Seeing a form such as yours brings supreme joy.
text.en-trans: tongwa khyé dré ku la lhak tu dza

text.en: For many years and months, your body and mind
text.en-trans: ringpö lodé trö kyi lü sem kün

text.en: Were nourished by compassion alone.
text.en-trans: nyingjé nyakma chik gi söpa yi

text.en: Bodhisattva, is there any act, even the motion of your arms,
text.en-trans: sempa khyé kyi chak gi kyangkum yen

text.en: That is not for the benefit of beings?
text.en-trans: tadak drowé döndu magyur gang

text.en: How you descended from a divine pure realm and the like—
text.en-trans: dakpa lha yi zhing né peb tsul sok

text.en: The hidden details of your past lives may not be known,
text.en-trans: kokgyur kyerab mangpo mi shé kyang

text.en: But your manifest qualities cause faith and reverence to grow.
text.en-trans: ngöngyur yönten dé yi dé gü pel

text.en: Guru of unparalleled great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: When the fine mansion of the ten sciences in this snowy land
text.en-trans: gangchen chu trak rigpé khang zang dé

text.en: Was about to be destroyed by fierce storms of rain and wind,
text.en-trans: char dang lung gi tor la nyewé dü

text.en: You skilfully preserved it through explanation, debate, and composition—
text.en-trans: ché tsö tsompé tab kyi dzin khé khyé

text.en: Guru of unparalleled great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: You are untainted by the slightest self-interest in whatever you do,
text.en-trans: luk nyi dzepa gang dang gangla yang

text.en: Whether in the temporal or spiritual domains.
text.en-trans: rang dö nyepa tra mö magöpar

text.en: Whoever examines you finds you free of any flaw.
text.en-trans: su yi tak kyang kyön dang dralwa khyé

text.en: Guru of unparalleled great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: A king of Dharma, you have come to a pure realm,
text.en-trans: chö kyi gyalpo dakpé zhing du peb

text.en: And provide support for the hopes of fortunate disciples.
text.en-trans: kalzang lobmé rewé sem kyi ten

text.en: Lineage-holder, who sustains the ground of the teachings,
text.en-trans: tenpé zhima kyongwé gyü dzin khyé

text.en: Guru of unparalleled great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: You spread the excellent tradition of pure vegetarianism
text.en-trans: lün mong chenzen tumpö tsowa zhin

text.en: In this land where everyone hungers for flesh and blood,
text.en-trans: sha trak zé la ngampé yul jong dir

text.en: Like ignorant, savage beasts craving their quarry.
text.en-trans: kar zetsang mé sol zang pel khen khyé

text.en: Guru of unparalleled great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: The more outer possessions one accumulates,
text.en-trans: chi yi longchö chitsam pelwa zhin

text.en: The more one’s inner renunciation fades.
text.en-trans: nang gi ngejung shuk kyi sabpé dü

text.en: You deeply understand such inherent faults of saṃsāra—
text.en-trans: khorwé rang tsang tingné rigpa khyé

text.en: Guru of unparalleled great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: At a time when even among Mahāyāna practitioners
text.en-trans: tekchen chö kyi dral du zhuk na yang

text.en: Few people study the essential points of practice,
text.en-trans: nyamlen né la lob khen nyungwé dü

text.en: You have filled your mindstream with bodhicitta—
text.en-trans: changchub sem kyi tukgyü gangwa khyé

text.en: Guru of unparalleled great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: The secret of the oceanic path of sūtra and mantra teachings,
text.en-trans: do ngak chö tsul gyatsö lam gyi sang

text.en: The profound meaning of reality beyond the ordinary mind,
text.en-trans: lo lé depa chönyi zabmö dön

text.en: For you the sun of wisdom has dawned within the heart—
text.en-trans: khyenpé nyima nying né sharwa khyé

text.en: Incomparable guru of great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: When there are those who collect empowerments and transmissions
text.en-trans: kyedzok dampé zab né mishepar

text.en: Without knowing the profound points of generation and completion,
text.en-trans: wang lung chö kyi tob drang sokpé dü

text.en: You reveal the secret keys to view, meditation and conduct,
text.en-trans: ta gom chöpé né sang tön khen khyé

text.en: Incomparable guru of great kindness, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: When the activity of the effortless path of the luminous Great Perfection,
text.en-trans: tekpé yangtsé ösal dzogpa ché

text.en: The pinnacle of all vehicles, is especially swift,
text.en-trans: tsolmé lam gyi trinlé nyurwé dü

text.en: You are the source of the blessings and realization of the ultimate lineage—
text.en-trans: dön gyü jinlab tokpé jungné khyé

text.en: Incomparable and most kind guru, to you I pray.
text.en-trans: tsungmé drinchen lamar solwa deb

text.en: Although you have given many profound instructions,
text.en-trans: zab gü damngak mangdu nang na yang

text.en: I find it hard to employ the wish-fulfilling jewel of bodhicitta
text.en-trans: dö jung norbu drawé changchub sem

text.en: As an antidote to my inveterate self-clinging.
text.en-trans: dakdzin sem kyi nyenpor dro kawé

text.en: Lord guru, please continue to care for me with your compassion.
text.en-trans: dadung tukjé kyong shik lama jé

text.en: Through the force of habit, my thoughts run amok,
text.en-trans: gompé wang gi gang sar gyukpa yi

text.en: Like a wild horse, who has been blind since birth.
text.en-trans: ta gö longwa drawé namtok di

text.en: Even when I rest evenly, I cannot make my mind comply—
text.en-trans: nyampar zhak kyang kol du mi tubpé

text.en: Lord guru, catch me with the lasso of your blessings!
text.en-trans: jinlab zhakpé chong shik lama jé

text.en: That I might dispel entirely the darkness of doubt,
text.en-trans: tetsom münpa ta né sangwa yi

text.en: With realization that is as bright as the full moon
text.en-trans: nyagang dawa drawé tokpa zhik

text.en: Arising suddenly within the skyscape of my mind—
text.en-trans: nyurdu sem kyi namkhar sharwa la

text.en: Lord guru, please transmit your realization with force!
text.en-trans: tsentab gongpa por chik lama jé

text.en: Not knowing how to avoid obstacles on the way,
text.en-trans: barché trang lé zur tab mishepé

text.en: In my ignorance, I’m like a tiny insect on the road.
text.en-trans: lamkhé sinbu drawé mongpa dak

text.en: If I should ever go astray through adversity,
text.en-trans: galkyen lokpé lam du dro si na

text.en: Lord guru, rescue me with hands of love!
text.en-trans: tsewé chak gi kyob shik lama jé

text.en: We cannot predict when and where he will strike—
text.en-trans: nam ong dir ong cha jok mepa yi

text.en: The demon Yama is like a bolt of thunder in the sky.
text.en-trans: namkhé tok dang drawé chidak dü

text.en: Now, when we are vulnerable and our lives in peril,
text.en-trans: nyamchung sok gi shé du babpé nyin

text.en: Lord guru, be the one who guides us at the helm!
text.en-trans: drenpé depön dzö chik lama jé

text.en: In this life, the next life, and the bardo state,
text.en-trans: di dang chima bardö nekab dang

text.en: In happiness and sorrow, good and bad, whatever befalls us,
text.en-trans: kyiduk leknyé lé kö gar bab kyang

text.en: We have no other source of refuge but you, O protector.
text.en-trans: gönpo ganglé kyab zhen mi dukpé

text.en: Lord guru, look on us with your compassion, never parting!
text.en-trans: dralmé tukjé zik shik lama jé

text.en: A moon, beautified by the light of knowledge and realization,
text.en-trans: khyen tok ö kyi dzepé dawa dé

text.en: Wherever you may go, you are the crowning glory of all.
text.en-trans: gangdu song yang kün gyi tsuk gi gyen

text.en: As you are the source of refuge for all of us living beings,
text.en-trans: ngachak tö ché kyendrö kyabné su

text.en: May your lotus feet remain steadfast for an ocean of aeons!
text.en-trans: kalwa gyatsö bardu zhabten shok

text.en: From the first lessons that must be learned as a child
text.en-trans: jipé tokmé sheja lob tsul né

text.en: To how the elderly prepare for their journey beyond life,
text.en-trans: genpö chimé dro ché drub tsul sok

text.en: You are a guide to dos and don’ts, both spiritual and secular.
text.en-trans: luk nyi langdor tönpé depön khyé

text.en: As a lamp for beings in this final age, may you live long!
text.en-trans: dü té drowé drönmer zhabten shok

text.en: When all manner of negative conduct disturbs themamos,
text.en-trans: ngen chö na gü mamo trukpa lé

text.en: Who then inflict their incurable disease upon the world,
text.en-trans: chömé né kyi dzamling pongwé dü

text.en: Your noble intention is to make every effort to prevent this.
text.en-trans: bepa gya yi gokpé lhaksam chen

text.en: May you live long, a friend to those who lack protection!
text.en-trans: gönmé kyewö nyen du zhabten shok

text.en: As the corruption of various languages and scripts
text.en-trans: dra min ké dang yik rik drepa lé

text.en: Erodes the foundation stone of the two traditions,
text.en-trans: luk nyi sol khé mang do shikpé na

text.en: Protector, you preserve the stream of linguistic purity.
text.en-trans: rang ké tsangmé chugyün tüpé gön

text.en: Master of the ten sciences, may your life remain secure.
text.en-trans: chu trak rigpé dakpor zhabten shok

text.en: When the Dharma grove of sūtra and mantra in the Land of Snows
text.en-trans: gangjong do ngak chö kyi gatsal dé

text.en: Has diminished, like a sick person devoid of physical strength,
text.en-trans: zung zé nepa zhindu gyur dü dir

text.en: May this supreme holder of the teachings, who employs varied means,
text.en-trans: natsok tab kyi bepé tendzin chok

text.en: Live long as an ornament who beautifies Buddha’s teachings.
text.en-trans: tubten dzepé gyen du zhabten shok

text.en: When there are few who know ancient and modern sciences,
text.en-trans: na deng rigpé ta gyama chöpar

text.en: And there are many who, with little learning, speak falsely,
text.en-trans: tö chung lokpar mawa mangwé dü

text.en: You are the true gauge of what is true and what is not.
text.en-trans: yin min drang shenjé la tsangpé tik

text.en: May you live long, a treasury of ocean-like eloquence.
text.en-trans: lek shé gyatsö ter du zhabten shok

text.en: Lord Lodrö Tsungmé, 'Peerless Intellect’, was Mañjughoṣa in person,
text.en-trans: jampal yang ngö lodrö tsungmé jé

text.en: Whose enlightened resolve and activity were as vast as space itself,
text.en-trans: tukkyé dzetrin namkhé ta dang nyam

text.en: And you are working to further his activity wherever you go.
text.en-trans: trinlé gang sar pelwé jepo khyé

text.en: May you live long, splendour of the teachings and beings!
text.en-trans: ten dang drowé pal du zhabten shok

text.en: For me and all other beings in saṃsāra, devoid of Dharma,
text.en-trans: dak sok chömé khorwé semchen la

text.en: You are the sun that shines upon the crowns of our heads,
text.en-trans: langdor lam gyi nangwa salwa yi

text.en: And sheds light on the path of adopting and avoiding.
text.en-trans: chiwö tsuk gi nyima khyé yinpé

text.en: May you live long, a support for all with faith who yearn for liberation.
text.en-trans: tar dö depé ten du zhabten shok

text.en: Through the infallible truth of the precious Three Jewels,
text.en-trans: lumé rinchen sum gyi denpa dang

text.en: And the blessings of the Three Roots and oath-bound guardians,
text.en-trans: tsa sum damchen sungmé jinlab kyi

text.en: May the lotus feet of this incomparable guru remain steadfast,
text.en-trans: tsungmé lamé zhabpé yünten zhing

text.en: And may the light of his enlightened deeds beautify this world.
text.en-trans: dzetrin nangwé zhing di dzé gyur chik
